item.title: Trump Taps Arthur Graham Fisher for Amb. to Austria
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump nominated Arthur Graham Fisher as the next U.S. ambassador to Austria.

item.title: Trump Nominates Stacey Feinberg as Amb. to Luxembourg
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump nominated Stacey Feinberg as the next Ambassador to Luxembourg.

item.title: Trump Nominates Campos as Ambassador to Dominican Republic
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump nominated former CIA case officer Leah Francis Campos as U.S. Ambassador to the Dominican Republic.
